title: Watch: Shocking close encounter between US and Russian fighter jets near Alaska
content: US military officials released a video of a Russian fighter jet flying dangerously close to a US F-16 near Alaska on September 23, 2024. The incident underscores rising tensions as Russian and Chinese military activities intensify in the region, prompting calls for increased US military presence.
summary: US military officials released a video of a Russian fighter jet flying dangerously close to a US F-16 near Alaska on September 23, 2024. The incident underscores rising tensions as Russian and Chinese military activities intensify in the region, prompting calls for increased US military presence.

title: Indian diaspora's cultural impact on America: From cuisine to cricket
What is October surprise Hillary Clinton warns Kamala Harris about?
content: "Russians are active in the election, so is Iran, we know. Chinese uses TikTok; they certainly used against Biden and for Trump. I think they're a little less pro-Trump right now. So you look at where people get there information from and they get their information largely from social media. And so the campaign is doing its best job to combat that both domestic and foreign false disinformation," Hillary said.
summary: "Russians are active in the election, so is Iran, we know. Chinese uses TikTok; they certainly used against Biden and for Trump. I think they're a little less pro-Trump right now. So you look at where people get there information from and they get their information largely from social media. And so the campaign is doing its best job to combat that both domestic and foreign false disinformation," Hillary said.

title: Princess Beatrice is pregnant, expecting her second baby with Mozzi
content: ​​The palace said 36-year-old Beatrice and her husband Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi “are very pleased to announce that they are expecting their second child together in early spring.” The baby will be a sibling for 8-year-old Wolfie – Mapello Mozzi’s son from a previous relationship — and the couple’s 3-year-old daughter Sienna.
summary: ​​The palace said 36-year-old Beatrice and her husband Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi “are very pleased to announce that they are expecting their second child together in early spring.” The baby will be a sibling for 8-year-old Wolfie – Mapello Mozzi’s son from a previous relationship — and the couple’s 3-year-old daughter Sienna.

title: Did people cancel Netflix subscription after chairman's donation to Kamala Harris?
content: Shortly after Hastings’ endorsement, fans of Donald Trump began urging people to drop the service. Some posted photos showing they had closed their accounts alongside the hashtag #CancelNetflix. Three days after the endorsement, July 26 was the single worst day for Netflix cancelations this year. After July 29, daily cancellations returned to normal levels and have remained stable since then.
summary: Shortly after Hastings’ endorsement, fans of Donald Trump began urging people to drop the service. Some posted photos showing they had closed their accounts alongside the hashtag #CancelNetflix. Three days after the endorsement, July 26 was the single worst day for Netflix cancelations this year. After July 29, daily cancellations returned to normal levels and have remained stable since then.

title: Elon Musk calls Vinod Khosla 'dumb' in Twitter feud over Argentina’s economy
content: Elon Musk and Vinod Khosla clashed over Argentina’s economy, with Musk siding with President Javier Milei’s policies. Khosla's incorrect unemployment figure led to a heated exchange, further fueled by media highlighting Argentina's rising poverty under Milei.
summary: Elon Musk and Vinod Khosla clashed over Argentina’s economy, with Musk siding with President Javier Milei’s policies. Khosla's incorrect unemployment figure led to a heated exchange, further fueled by media highlighting Argentina's rising poverty under Milei.

title: Disabled UK journalist forced to crawl to flight bathroom as there's no wheelchair: 'Wow. It’s 2024 and...'
content: LOT Polish Airlines did not have any wheelchair on board as it's not their policy. BBC war correspondent Frank Gardner who is paralyzed had to crawl on his back to the washroom because of this policy. He posted his photo on X triggering a debate on how inhumane the airline policy is. Gardner, however, said the cabin crew were very helpful and apologetic.
summary: LOT Polish Airlines did not have any wheelchair on board as it's not their policy. BBC war correspondent Frank Gardner who is paralyzed had to crawl on his back to the washroom because of this policy. He posted his photo on X triggering a debate on how inhumane the airline policy is. Gardner, however, said the cabin crew were very helpful and apologetic.

title: JD Vance vs Tim Walz debate tonight: Why polls think this could make or break US elections
content: ​A VP debate is not as significant as the presidential debate which took place this year on September 10 between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. About 30 per cent of those who watched the debate developed a more positive opinion about Kamala Harris after the debate., This includes 21 per cent of independent voters. For Donald Trump, most respondents said their opinion remained unchanged; it worsened for 14 per cent.
summary: ​A VP debate is not as significant as the presidential debate which took place this year on September 10 between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. About 30 per cent of those who watched the debate developed a more positive opinion about Kamala Harris after the debate., This includes 21 per cent of independent voters. For Donald Trump, most respondents said their opinion remained unchanged; it worsened for 14 per cent.

title: Prince Harry is like mother Diana, seeking to entertain; William always jealous: Ex-bodyguard
content: Prince William made an Instagram post just hours before Prince Harry's UK event. Reports claimed that Instagram post was made to overshadow Harry's UK return though William's friends have denied any links between the two. Harry's former bodyguard Ken Wharfe said Harry was always the more popular one among the two and William was jealous of him since childhood.
summary: Prince William made an Instagram post just hours before Prince Harry's UK event. Reports claimed that Instagram post was made to overshadow Harry's UK return though William's friends have denied any links between the two. Harry's former bodyguard Ken Wharfe said Harry was always the more popular one among the two and William was jealous of him since childhood.

title: At least six people including local chief of paramilitary revolutionary guard killed by gunmen in Iran
content: Unidentified gunmen killed at least six people, including a local Revolutionary Guard chief, in two separate attacks in southern Iran's Sistan and Baluchistan province. The first attack claimed the lives of a town council head and two Guard members in Nikshahar, while the second killed two police officers in Khash. No group has claimed responsibility yet.
summary: Unidentified gunmen killed at least six people, including a local Revolutionary Guard chief, in two separate attacks in southern Iran's Sistan and Baluchistan province. The first attack claimed the lives of a town council head and two Guard members in Nikshahar, while the second killed two police officers in Khash. No group has claimed responsibility yet.

title: Watch: IDF prepares for localised ground invasion in southern Lebanon
content: Israel intensified its ground invasion preparations by targeting Hezbollah weapon facilities in southern Lebanon. The IDF's 98th Division, having gained experience in Gaza, is now conducting localized operations. Concurrently, airstrikes in Beirut targeted Hezbollah's military infrastructure.
summary: Israel intensified its ground invasion preparations by targeting Hezbollah weapon facilities in southern Lebanon. The IDF's 98th Division, having gained experience in Gaza, is now conducting localized operations. Concurrently, airstrikes in Beirut targeted Hezbollah's military infrastructure.

title: Germany arrests woman who allegedly passed airport details to suspected spy for China
content: German authorities have arrested a Chinese national in Leipzig for allegedly passing sensitive information on a major air freight hub to a suspected Chinese spy. The accused, Yaqi X., reportedly shared details about military equipment and passenger transports linked to a German defense company.
summary: German authorities have arrested a Chinese national in Leipzig for allegedly passing sensitive information on a major air freight hub to a suspected Chinese spy. The accused, Yaqi X., reportedly shared details about military equipment and passenger transports linked to a German defense company.

title: 'Uncrewed surface vessel': Back-to-back attacks damage two ships off Yemen
content: A UK maritime agency reported a missile strike on a merchant vessel northwest of Yemen's Al Hudayah port, causing damage but leaving the crew unharmed. This incident follows a sea drone strike on another ship in the same region. Investigations are ongoing, and vessels are advised to exercise caution.
summary: A UK maritime agency reported a missile strike on a merchant vessel northwest of Yemen's Al Hudayah port, causing damage but leaving the crew unharmed. This incident follows a sea drone strike on another ship in the same region. Investigations are ongoing, and vessels are advised to exercise caution.

title: Tibetan group in India protests against China and human rights situation in homeland
content: Dozens of Tibetans in India staged a protest outside China's embassy against human rights abuses in Tibet. Police intervened, detaining some demonstrators. The Tibetan Youth Congress organized the protest, accusing China of cultural repression. The Dalai Lama and the Tibetan government-in-exile in Dharamshala continue to call for international support to safeguard Tibetan culture and autonomy.
summary: Dozens of Tibetans in India staged a protest outside China's embassy against human rights abuses in Tibet. Police intervened, detaining some demonstrators. The Tibetan Youth Congress organized the protest, accusing China of cultural repression. The Dalai Lama and the Tibetan government-in-exile in Dharamshala continue to call for international support to safeguard Tibetan culture and autonomy.

title: Nato's longtime chief hands over to former Dutch premier Mark Rutte
content: Jens Stoltenberg steps down as Nato Secretary-General, succeeded by former Dutch PM Mark Rutte. Rutte prioritizes Nato's support for Ukraine, increasing defense spending, and strengthening partnerships. He emphasizes maintaining strong trans-Atlantic ties and expresses confidence in working with the future US administration. Stoltenberg praised Rutte's background for effective leadership.
summary: Jens Stoltenberg steps down as Nato Secretary-General, succeeded by former Dutch PM Mark Rutte. Rutte prioritizes Nato's support for Ukraine, increasing defense spending, and strengthening partnerships. He emphasizes maintaining strong trans-Atlantic ties and expresses confidence in working with the future US administration. Stoltenberg praised Rutte's background for effective leadership.

title: China marks 75 years of Communist Party rule: Can Xi Jinping help avoid a Soviet-style collapse?
content: China's 75th anniversary of Communist rule was marked quietly amid fears of a Soviet-style collapse. President Xi Jinping emphasizes party loyalty and ideological discipline, wary of vulnerabilities like economic stagnation and public discontent. Xi’s focus on control and suppression highlights concerns over China’s economic future and the CCP's long-term stability.
summary: China's 75th anniversary of Communist rule was marked quietly amid fears of a Soviet-style collapse. President Xi Jinping emphasizes party loyalty and ideological discipline, wary of vulnerabilities like economic stagnation and public discontent. Xi’s focus on control and suppression highlights concerns over China’s economic future and the CCP's long-term stability.

title: 'Free today after years because ...': What Julian Assange said in his first public statement after release from prison
content: Julian Assange addressed the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe, reflecting on his release from a British prison after serving five years. He admitted to charges under the Espionage Act, claiming his confinement was due to his journalistic activities in exposing classified US military misconduct.
summary: Julian Assange addressed the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe, reflecting on his release from a British prison after serving five years. He admitted to charges under the Espionage Act, claiming his confinement was due to his journalistic activities in exposing classified US military misconduct.

title: Craters or sinkholes? Scientists investigate mysterious formations beneath lake Michigan
content: Scientists, using sonar technology, have discovered about 40 enormous craters ranging from 500 to 1,000 feet in diameter beneath Lake Michigan's surface. These formations, unveiled during a survey in 2024, are believed to be linked to gas or water upwelling and exhibit thriving aquatic life.
summary: Scientists, using sonar technology, have discovered about 40 enormous craters ranging from 500 to 1,000 feet in diameter beneath Lake Michigan's surface. These formations, unveiled during a survey in 2024, are believed to be linked to gas or water upwelling and exhibit thriving aquatic life.

title: Several feared dead in school bus fire in Thailand
Thai farmer electrocutes over 100 endangered crocodiles on his farm; here's why
content: Thai crocodile farmer Natthapak Khumkad euthanized over 100 endangered Siamese crocodiles to prevent them from escaping into the community as Typhoon Yagi's relentless rains eroded their enclosure. The storm's severe impact compelled him to prioritize public safety, making a dire decision within 24 hours.
summary: Thai crocodile farmer Natthapak Khumkad euthanized over 100 endangered Siamese crocodiles to prevent them from escaping into the community as Typhoon Yagi's relentless rains eroded their enclosure. The storm's severe impact compelled him to prioritize public safety, making a dire decision within 24 hours.
